name: Margarita
description: Originating in 1940s Mexico, the Margarita is a blend of tequila, orange liqueur, and lime juice, typically served in a salt-rimmed glass. Known as the quintessential Mexican cocktail, its perfect balance of sweet, sour, salty, and bitter flavors makes it a worldwide favorite.
instructions: Rim edge of margarita glass in lime juice and coarse salt
Combine ingredients with ice and shake well.
